## WchInlineEditServiceV2 interface

Implementation of the edit service used by the wchEditable directive.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface WchInlineEditServiceV2 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [fromEvent(aName)](./edit-api.wchinlineeditservicev2.fromevent.md) | Attaches to an event issued by the edit library |
|  [registerComponent(nativeElement, accessor, renderingContext$)](./edit-api.wchinlineeditservicev2.registercomponent.md) | Registers a particular DOM element as editable |
